issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/APIReference/API_GetTemplateSummary.html

{quote}
ResourceTypes
A list of all the template resource types that are defined in the template, such as AWS::EC2::Instance, AWS::Dynamo::Table, and Custom::MyCustomInstance.

Type: String list
{quote}

AWS Returns:
{code:xml}
<GetTemplateSummaryResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/">
  <GetTemplateSummaryResult>
    <Description>Test</Description>
    <CapabilitiesReason>The following resource(s) require capabilities: [AWS::IAM::AccessKey, AWS::IAM::User]</CapabilitiesReason>
    <Capabilities>
      <member>CAPABILITY_IAM</member>
    </Capabilities>
    <Parameters/>
    <ResourceTypes>
      <member>AWS::IAM::User</member>
      <member>AWS::IAM::AccessKey</member>
    </ResourceTypes>
    <Version>2010-09-09</Version>
  </GetTemplateSummaryResult>
  <ResponseMetadata>
    <RequestId>d71af43e-f302-11e5-87b0-4d7c119460f2</RequestId>
  </ResponseMetadata>
</GetTemplateSummaryResponse>
{code}

Eucalyptus Returns:
{code:xml}
<GetTemplateSummaryResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/">
  <GetTemplateSummaryResult>
    <Capabilities>
      <member>CAPABILITY_IAM</member>
    </Capabilities>
    <CapabilitiesReason>The following resource(s) require capabilities: [AWS::IAM::User, AWS::IAM::AccessKey]</CapabilitiesReason>
    <Description>Test</Description>
    <Parameters/>
  </GetTemplateSummaryResult>
  <ResponseMetadata>
    <RequestId>80e5b106-eeb9-4599-9cef-c8858bb218ae</RequestId>
  </ResponseMetadata>
</GetTemplateSummaryResponse>
{code}
fields.summary: CloudFormation does not return ResourceTypes in the GetTemplateSummaryResponse

comments.body: Kicking out of 4.3, [~ethomas], unless this is already complete.
[~shaon] How exactly were you calling GetTemplateSummary?
[~shaon] Can you provide the template you used to reproduce this issue?

[~mmunn1], I was using euca2ools against AWS.

e.g
Added the following to an existing euca2ools ini file or creating a new one,
{code}
[region us-east-1]
user = shaon

[user shaon]
key-id = <ACCESS_KEY>
secret-key = <SECRET_KEY>
{code}

Not sure what template I was using for that exact test, but the following template should also work,
https://gist.github.com/shaon/3a4dd111364d6b54305a05ca13a266e2

Then ran the template summary command,
{code}
euform-get-template-summary --template-file basic_cfn.template --region shaon@us-east-1 --debug
{code}

The above should result something like following,
{code:xml}
<GetTemplateSummaryResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/">
  <GetTemplateSummaryResult>
    <ResourceTypes>
      <member>AWS::IAM::AccessKey</member>
      <member>AWS::EC2::VPC</member>
      <member>AWS::IAM::User</member>
      <member>AWS::EC2::Instance</member>
      <member>AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup</member>
      <member>AWS::EC2::Subnet</member>
    </ResourceTypes>
.....
{code}

Code Review Request : EucalyptusEUCA-12151 CloudFormation does not return ResourceTypes in the GetTemplateSummaryResponse

branch : dev-mmunn1-EUCA-12151

diff :  git show --color ed98e5beca81950da3eaffe20240a1d054b264a0

Summary: AWS GetTemplateSummaryResponse returns a list of all resource types, euclyptus dos not.
Solution: add ResourceTypes to GetTemplateSummaryResult 

New GetTemplateSummaryResponse Output (using attached test-euca-12151.json):
{code:xml}
<GetTemplateSummaryResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/">
	<GetTemplateSummaryResult>
		<Capabilities>
			<member>CAPABILITY_IAM</member>
		</Capabilities>
		<CapabilitiesReason>The following resource(s) require capabilities: [AWS::IAM::User, AWS::IAM::AccessKey]</CapabilitiesReason>
		<ResourceTypes>
			<member>AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup</member>
			<member>AWS::S3::Bucket</member>
			<member>AWS::IAM::User</member>
			<member>AWS::IAM::AccessKey</member>
		</ResourceTypes>
		<Parameters />
	</GetTemplateSummaryResult>
	<ResponseMetadata>
		<RequestId>9394de4a-b6ee-445a-b8a1-3d3f25ff0f48</RequestId>
	</ResponseMetadata>
</GetTemplateSummaryResponse>
{code}

Unit test : described in comments,

[~mmunn1]
Looks good, mostly Mike, just a couple of things.
1) I don't think you need the String 'resourceType' field in GetTemplateSummaryResult, it doesn't appear to be used anywhere.  The ResourceList resourceTypes is of course used, so I might remove the String resourceType field and also corresponding value in cloudformation-binding.xml
2) The ResourceList resourceTypes should have an '@JsonSerialize(using = ResourceListRemoveMemberSerializer.class, as=ResourceList.class)' annotation on it as well.  This lets the value not contain "member" when it is serialized via JSON.

[~ethomas] Thanks!

1) I thought I had already removed that, your right it is not used.
2) Added

new diff: git show --color e7a7dc71267fe9d4d4b6b9985374d8720cc24a15

{{ResourcesTypes}} lists still fails to display.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.1-0.25135.61.20161031git2ca359f.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus 4.3.1 cloud - [hspencer-145|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.3/145/]
# Created non-eucalyptus account
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini
[root@e-36 ~]# aws configure --profile devops-admin
AWS Access Key ID [None]: AKIAAXAIF24COS2GVXCI
AWS Secret Access Key [None]: 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
Default region name [None]: us-east-1
Default output format [None]: json
{code}
# Used linked {{cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition.json}} template with {{GetTemplateSummary}} API call using AWS CLI:
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# aws --endpoint-url http://cloudformation.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ cloudformation get-template-summary --template-body file://cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition.json --profile devops-admin

[~hspencer] it turns out this fix was merged into master and is present in 4.0 but not maint-4.3 or security-4.3.
I will merge this fix maint-4.3 and security-4.3.
[~mmunn1], no problem.  Just re-assign it to me once its been merged in those two branches.  Thanks for responding so quick on this issue.  Greatly appreciate it.
I merged the fix into both  maint-4.3 and security-4.3

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.1-0.25149.70.20161107git7d68652.el7}}

*Euca2ools Version*

{{3.3.1-0.1797.47.20161104git4d3f5dd.el7}}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.3.1 cloud with VPC - [hspencer-164|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.3/164/]
# Create non-eucalyptus account:
{code}
[root@g-22-05 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini
{code}
# Install nightly euca2ools:
{code}
[root@g-22-05 ~]# yum install -y http://downloads.eucalyptus.com/software/euca2ools/nightly/devel/rhel/7/x86_64/euca2ools-3.3.1-0.1797.47.20161104git4d3f5dd.el7.noarch.rpm
{code}
# Use linked {{cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} with GetTemplateSummary:
{code}
[root@g-22-05 ~]# euform-get-template-summary --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --region devops-admin@
DESCRIPTION	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::VPC
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::Subnet
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::InternetGateway
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::VPCGatewayAttachment
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::RouteTable
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::Route
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::SubnetRouteTableAssociation
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::NetworkAcl
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::NetworkAclEntry
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::SubnetNetworkAclAssociation
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::S3::Bucket
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::AutoScaling::ScalingPolicy
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm
PARAMETER	ImageId	false		Ubuntu Image id
PARAMETER	KeyName	false		Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
PARAMETER	InstanceType	false	m1.medium	Type of EC2 instance to launch.
PARAMETER	MinSize	false	2	Minimum number of EC2 instances.
PARAMETER	MaxSize	false	4	Maximum number of EC2 instances.
{code}
